message: Let's start with a fair split. I propose 6000$ for me and 4000$ for you.
I believe a 50-50 split is the fairest way to start. This way we both get $5000, and we can avoid losing value through inflation by agreeing now.
How about I take 5500$ and you take 4500$? This is closer to an even split, considering the inflation effect on your side.
